content: Asking for a friend. Does anyone know if the CMS LIS (Low Income Subsidy) status of a patient is available in BlueButton data? (1.0 or 2.0)? If not, does anyone know of a way to programmatically access this information?

Brendan Keeler said:

Asking for a friend. Does anyone know if the CMS LIS (Low Income Subsidy) status of a patient is available in BlueButton data? (1.0 or 2.0)? If not, does anyone know of a way to programmatically access this information?
